properties.name: Hexham Royal Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Burnlaw Hexham Royal Hotel Priestpopple Hexham Northumberland NE46 1PQ Tel: +44 (0)1434 602270 Fax: +44 (0)1434 604084 Email: service@hexham-royal-hotel.co.uk Prices: Single en-suite £46.50 Double en-suite £79.95 Family (4 adults) £105.00 Weekend rates: 2 nights £145.00, 3 nights £175.00 Directions: From Newcastle follow the A69 west to Hexham. From Carlisle follow the A69 east to Hexham. At the Hexham roundabout, turn off towards Hexham. At the second mini-rioundabout turn left and pass the railway station. At the next mini roundabout turn right onto Priestpopple. The Royal Hotel is 200 yards along on the right side, directly opposite the bus station (parking through central archway).

properties.name: Nent Hall Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Burnlaw Nent Hall Country House Hotel Alston Cumbria, CA9 3LQ Tel: +44 (0)1434 381584 Email: info@nenthall.com Prices: Single B&B - £95 Double/twin ensuite B&B - £140 Family (sleeps 4/5) B&B - £190 + £20 per person Directions: From A1 (Junction 58) onto the A68 then the A689, Nent Hall is two miles outside of Nent Head village on the left. From M6, leave at Penrith and join A686 to Alston, then onto A689 at Alston (signposted Nent Head) Nent Hall is two miles out of Alston on the right.

properties.name: Strand Cottage B&B
properties.description: Posted by BurnlawStrand Cottage Bed & Breakfast Main Road (A69) Bardon Mill, Hexham Northumberland NE47 7BH Tel: +44 (0)1434 344643 Mobile: +44 (0)7833 968655 Email: stay@strand-cottage.co.uk Prices: £25-38 per person Directions: From Carlisle - Take the A69 past Haltwistle and continue for 3 miles. Drive past a BP garage and Little Chef. Strand Cottage is the next house on the left 1.25 miles further on. From Newcastle - Take the A69 past Hexham and continue through Haydon Bridge. 4 miles further on watch for the \'Smoke\' warning sign. Strand Cottage is on the right just past the trees
